reviewText: Each of the four sessions on this DVD is only about 4 minutes long and extremely superficial.  This makes it of relatively little use on its own.  In order to get a proper group study going, it is essential for participants to get and use their own participant guide (which is not much expense, only $5) but if you are looking for something that you can just load in the DVD player and let run for 20 minutes followed by a 20 minute group discussion this in not for you.  The content of the video is okay, but to reiterate it is very superficial and only scratches the surface of Islam.
